name: fiori-fundamentals
description: Fiori Fundamentals is a Design System and HTML/CSS Component Library used to build modern Product User Experiences with the SAP look and feel. Learn more about this project at - http://sap.github.io/fundamental/

scripts.build: npm run style:remove && npm run style:compile && npm run style:rename && npm run style:postCSS && npm run style:assets
scripts.build:prod: npm run build && npm run style:less && npm run style:minify
scripts.docs:compile: npm run build && npm run docs:config && cp scss/icons/SAP-icons.woff docs/css/; cp dist/fiori-fundamentals-ie11.css docs/css
scripts.docs:prod: npm run docs:compile && cd docs && bundle install && bundle exec jekyll build --config _config.yml,_config-library.yml,_config-prod.yml && cd ..
scripts.docs: npm run docs:compile && cd docs && bundle install && bundle exec jekyll build --config _config.yml,_config-library.yml && cd ..
scripts.lint:pre-commit:
printf "running pre-commit lint..."  && npm run lint && printf "done!
"
scripts.start: npm run docs:compile && cd docs && bundle install && bundle exec jekyll serve --incremental --config _config.yml,_config-library.yml
scripts.style:less: mv dist/fundamentals-ie11.less.css less/fiori-fundamentals-ie11.less && mv dist/fundamentals.less.css less/fiori-fundamentals.less && ./scripts/less.js
scripts.style:postCSS: postcss --config config/postcss.config.js  --replace dist/**/*.css && postcss --config config/postcss.config.js  --replace dist/*.css
scripts.style:remove: if [ -d dist/ ]; then rm -rf dist/; fi
scripts.style:rename: mv dist/all.css dist/fiori-fundamentals.css && mv dist/all-ie11.css dist/fiori-fundamentals-ie11.css
scripts.test:update: server-test start:playground:default http-get://localhost:3030 test:reference && backstop approve --config ./test/visual-regression-tests/config/backstopConfig.js
